actions.description: List of actions that modify a repository.

params.description: Key/value pairs passed as parameters to the action.

autoMerge.description: Merge a pull request automatically if all have checks have passed and all approvals have been given.

autoMergeAfter.description: If set, automatically merge the pull request after it has been open for the specified amount of time. Only applied if `autoMerge` is `true`. The value is a Go duration, like 5m or 1h.

branchName.description: If set, used as th name of the branch to commit changes to. Defaults to an auto-generated name if not set.

changeLimit.description: Number of pull requests to create in one run. Useful to reduce strain on a system caused by, for example, many CI/CD jobs created at the same time.

commitMessage.description: If set, used as the message when changes get committed. Defaults to an auto-generated message if not set.

createOnly.description: Create pull requests only. Don't attempt to update a pull request on a subsequent run.

filters.description: Filters allow targeting a specific repositories.

params.description: Key/value pairs passed as parameters to the filter.

reverse.description: Reverse the result of the filter, i.e. negate it.

keepBranchAfterMerge.description: If `true`, keep the branch after a pull request has been merged.

labels.description: List of labels to attach to a pull request.

mergeOnce.description: If `true`, no new pull request is being created if a previous pull request has been merged for this task.

name.description: The name of the task. Used as an identifier.

configuration.description: Key/value pairs that hold additional configuration for the plugin. Sent to the plugin once on startup.

prBody.description: If set, used as the body of the pull request.

prTitle.description: If set, used as the title of the pull request.
